title.narrative: Delivering TA for ICRG - OJEU Contract with IPE

description.narrative: This activity (Delivering TA for ICRG - OJEU Contract with IPE) is a component of Infrastructure for Climate Resilient Growth in India reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £7,022,808. This component benefits India, and works in the following sector(s): Environmental policy and administrative management, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: IPE Global Private Limited. The start date is 21-11-2016 and the end date is 30-05-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Environment - Water, Natural Resource Management and Environment - Environment - policy, planning and administration
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - rural devt
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2020 Quarter 1
